posts.tweetText:
L1s are now outpacing most US public companies by revenue. 

Internet Capital Markets are heating up.

The total TTM (trailing twelve-month) revenue for US stocks tops $22T. 


@solana
 now ranks in the top 30% of companies, generating over $2.1B annualized real economic value

The best months of the bull market are ahead of us

People have forgotten what funny money season looks like

November 2021 vibes
So basically the EU said we really want to make a deal with the US but please give us 2-3 months summer vacation xD

At some point in the next 6 months, a remixed 228 proposal is going to pass and Solana's LST ratio is going to go from 11.5% to 20%+

Then everyone is going to realize that an ecosystem's native emission rate is essentially its interest rate and cutting that amounts to a rate cut

Crypto hasn't succeeded until
- "Crypto apps" are just apps 
- Crypto finance is just finance 
- Stablecoins are just money 
- People don't know which L1 their apps are running on
- We go from tens of millions of active crypto users to billions
- The world's assets are tokenized

The world is quickly moving towards more speculation and financial nihilism. Some brief thoughts of where we are and what's required to take things to the next level:

0DTE options (expiring the same day they are purchased) have gone from 6% of SPX options volume in 2016 to >50%

People are excited about HYPE because it has revenues but let's not kid ourselves; it has 2x upside before whales start unloading monumental bags and has tail risk of an exploit

The narrative that it will be become a general purpose L1 blockchain is nonsensical + forced
One of the most important talks of the entire Solana Accelerate conference
New York is unequivocally the capital of crypto globally

Not exactly on Solana native, but on 
@Backpack
 Exchange you can

- Deposit USDC
- Buy SOL
- Lend SOL
- Short PERP

And collectively earn

- lend rate
- sol stake rate
- perp funding rate

Which will take you double digits.

In 2021 this NFT sold for 13,000 SOL 2 months after minting for $70

And people think the bull market is over

We haven’t seen anything yet

@GoLadsCS

$100B in Total Volume.

Season 1 began in one part of the world, but the rest of the world awaits. 

To everyone who's been part of the journey, from the Pre-Season to now, thank you.

@DavidRhodus
 out now!

 story

@solana
, advice for founders & more!

@Backpack
This dog just told me we are going higher
This dog just out traded 90% of CT traders

All time high

Not forgetting the people crying and freaking out over a 30% pullback in BTC

Now that vote fees are going away, perhaps we should revisit Solana inflation again. Vote fees made smaller validators more dependent on inflation rewards in a bear market but now that concern is addressed.
The first and most important customer of L1s are developers

Dollar weakening, stocks in a strong uptrend

All systems go, soon things look like the Neutrino observatory
Market makers having fun on a Sunday?
